summary: This is a brief internal email from July 27, 2019, reporting that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was assessed by a psychologist and will remain on psychological observation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. It notes he will be assessed again the following day, shortly before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) who was assessed by a psychologist and placed on psychological observation.

events.title: Psychological Assessment of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein was assessed by a psychologist at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) and placed on psychological observation. A follow-up assessment was scheduled for the next day.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was assessed by a psychologist on July 27, 2019, while incarcerated at the MCC.
Epstein was placed on psychological observation following the assessment.
A follow-up psychological assessment was scheduled for July 28, 2019, the day before his death.
